roleset.name: to found or establish a colony, establish a colony
roleset.note: COLONIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'colonize' based on survey of sentences in the ectb2. No VerbNet entry. (from colonize.01-v predicate notes)
COLONIZATION-N NOTES: Based on stratified 1 data. Comparison to colonize.01-v. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from colonization.01-n)

example.name: colonize-v: Plant colonization
example.text: [Doughty false cypress seeds]-1 seized the opportunity *-1 to colonize this hostile territory shunned * by other plants.
example.arg: this hostile territory shunned * by other plants

example.name: colonize-v: Passive
example.text: Plants-1 are often colonized *-1 by endophytic bacteria.
